item.title: Go: slices gotchas
item.description: Preface One of the features that I love the most about Go is the fact that it is unsurprising. One could even say that it is boring in some sense. This is a good trait of a programming language. When you code you should focus on the problem at hand, and not on what your language is doing that you don’t want. This article talks about one of the most “surprising” features of Go for newcomers: slices.
